About Us
Audiophiles rejoice. Miami Sound Bar is a venue where the audience can engage in a listening experience of a vast collection of vinyl records powered via a timeless high-fidelity system, assembled in the UK and customized to perfection in Japan. It's a unique place to sip on carefully crafted cocktails inspired by the sound-obsessed bars of Tokyo. Located at the heart of historic Downtown Miami, it aims to provide a relaxed social atmosphere as an alternative to clubs for Hi-Fi lovers and newbies.

Private Events
Miami Sound Bar can accommodate up to 40 people for cocktail-style events.
We offer buyouts only.
RESERVEÂ NOW
What's included
Signature Cocktails
â
Classic cocktails
wine
beer
Packages
GOLD
2 HRS | Max 40 people
5pm or 6pm start, open bar 2 hrs: $5,000
Plus 20% gratuity & FL sales tax
Total: $ 5,760
PLATINUM
4 HRS | Max 40 people
Open bar 4 hrs + snacks: $9,000
Plus 20% gratuity & FL sales tax
Total: $ 10,240
Music Selector is included with the price for the duration of the event.
Top shelf liquor is not included in the open bar, but may be ordered a la carte.
For more information or to book your event, email us at hello@miamisound.bar
